english.segment1: Everyone down on the floor. No sudden moves and lock the door. I've got this feeling I'm chasing. I'll never rest until I find it
english.segment2: See, I've been plotting away. In my heart every day. To put this plan into action. And though I try to resist. I find the thing is this. Until I get it there's no satisfaction
english.segment3: I want something you have. You must meet my demands. Don't move, hand it over. I won't stop until it's in my hands
